# coordinates

**Instance Property**

A triplet that represents the location in 3D space of the anchor that provides the measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
var coordinates: simd_double3 { get }
```

## Discussion

The measurement’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinatesType] determines the manner in which you interpret this property’s value.

## Locating the anchor

- **coordinatesType**: The type of coordinate system that the measurement conforms to.
- **signalStrength**: A value that represents the signal strength, in dBm, to the anchor that provides the measurement.
